intro.title: HEAVY EQUIPMENT CONTRACT SERVICE
intro.subtitle: Complete Maintenance & Operational Solutions from THEI
intro.description:
THEI (PT. TJM Heavy Equipment Indonesia) presents Heavy Equipment Contract Service — a comprehensive maintenance and operational program for companies that rely on heavy equipment units in project activities, mining, construction, logistics, and manufacturing industries.

Through 3-month, 6-month, and 1-year contract systems, THEI ensures each of your units operates optimally, efficiently, and with minimal downtime, supported by certified professional technicians and an integrated monitoring system.
intro.whatIsDesc: Contract Service is a total heavy equipment maintenance partnership, where THEI is responsible for routine maintenance, repairs, overhauls, to the replacement of critical components — at a fixed cost and schedule as per the agreement. Clients can focus on project productivity, while THEI handles all technical aspects of the unit.
